attributes.action: Allow private driving practice in England
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to change the DVSAs guidance regarding private driving practice in England during the third national lockdown, to bring it inline with Wales and Scotland.
attributes.background: We want the government to change the DVSAs guidance regarding private driving practice in England during the third national lockdown, to bring it inline with Wales and Scotland and allow private practice if it is part of an essential journey.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition, the DVSA has confirmed that dirivng practice as part of an essential journey is allowed.
